rukus.text: Ni$ Nefka tamusni i Dawed akked Sliman. Nnan: "ccekoan i Oebbi, i a$ Ismenyafen i waiau n yimdanen iumnen
Sliman iwoet Dawed, u inna: "a yimdanen! Nepwaselmed tutlayt n yifoax; ippunefk a$ si yal cci. Ayagi, s tidep, ard lfevl n uuee
Pwajemmlen d, i Sliman, i²asekoiwen is si leonun, imdanen, ifoax. Mdarraren
Armi, mi bbwven ar te$zut n twevfin, tenna d tweiuft: "a yaweiiuf, kecmemt ar ixxamen nnkwent, mulac, war ccekk, a kwent ied Sliman, neppa akked iasekoiwen is, ur faqen
Icmumee, ivua, $ef wayen d tenna. Inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi ad snemmre$ l$it iK, is i $ T$atev, nek akked imawlan iw; ad xedme$ ise$ ara Toaviv; Ssekcem iyi, s ueunu K, ar imdanen iK imaanen
Issefqed ifoax, inna: "acimi ur wala$ ara iccibib, day d l$ayeb
War ccekk, ad saaddi$ fellas aaaqeb uqsie, ne$ a t zlu$, ne$ a d iawi tasebbiwt tubrizt
Ur iaaiiel ara. Inna d: "fehme$ ayen ur tefhimev. Usi$ d $uoek si Saba, s usali unuie
Ih, ufi$ en tameiiut d tagellii nnsen. Ippunefk as si yal cci. £uoes asgeld abarar
Ufi$ p in, neppat akked ugdud is, la kennun i yiiij, war Oebbi. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Iveof iten seg ubrid, d$a nitni ur pwanhan
Acimi ur knan ara i Oebbi, id Issufu$en lesrar, di tmurt akked igenwan, i Ieoan ayen teppeffrem u ayen d tepberrieem
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
Inna: "a neeo ma tessawlev d tidep, ne$ ma kecc seg ikeddaben
Oue s teboap iw agi, veggeo asen p, sinna, wexxeo asen, wali acu ara d rren
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, tepwaveggeo iyi d teboap tukyist
Ih, s$uo Sliman. Apan: s yisem n Oebbi Aenin Ipeunun
Ur ssem$waoet ara iman nnwen $uoi, aset ed $uoi, d imvuaen
